name: Kanha
greetingText: I really like your name btw! Atiksh bhi thik h But Kanha Meri jaan h
wishText: I would always love to Have a Brother like you in every incarnation of Life My Sweet little bro ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Atiksh !! Yeee! Many many happy happy blah...
text2: M Yeh karne wala tha fir
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are My One and Only Special Bhai â™¥
outroText: Toh Meri Taraf se Hamesha Good Wishes and Blessings h Tere liye  ,
replayText: Hamesha Happy Rehna Mera Bhai ,  You are my Bestest Person in My whole life. My This life belongs to You meri Jaan . So Thanks for being the Reason for My Life Lil Bro. Cherish This Life And I will make sure to be your support in every situation in life . you can always rely on Me Kanha for anything. I love you mere chote Bhai ... A Very Happy Birthday
